name: Dangling Cat
description:
This is just a passion project made by me, a 16 years old student, so don't expect much. You play as a chonky cat that can use his tongue as a grappling hook and you have to escape from an UFO trying to capture you (dumb idea I know). Try to get the highest amount of points and gather enough money to buy silly hats :3.

Controls:

- WASD to move

- Hold Left click to grapple

- Spacebar to jump

I mostly used royalty free assets found online and my dad helped making the hats.

gl hf!
